name: Branding Los Angeles
tagline: Marketing That Will Make An Impression For Life
description: Branding Los Angeles is a full-service marketing agency providing unique branding solutions for nationwide brands, including logo design, website design & development, social media, influencer marketing, advertising campaigns, and much more. Whether you have a new start-up or need a simple re-branding, our team of experience professionals can help take you from idea to launch.
